name: DIRT BIKE MAD SKILLS - FREE 3D DIRT BIKE GAME
name_original: DIRT BIKE MAD SKILLS - FREE 3D DIRT BIKE GAME
description:
Go ahead and live out your motorbike racing dreams with DIRT BIKE MAD SKILLS - FREE 3D XTREME DIRT BIKE MAD STUNT SKILLS MANIA.

Ride your dirt bike on unusually challenging obstacle courses and try to complete all the levels, in this adrenaline action-packed , heart-thumping Dirt bike game./

Features:

-Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking behavior to the bike and rider.

-Unique and smooth gameplay

- Addictive , exciting and hard levels

-Accelerometer support

-Earn stars for your best local times.

Lets Play DIRT BIKE MAD SKILLS - FREE 3D XTREME DIRT BIKE MAD STUNT SKILLS MANIA And Break The Top Score.
